app.name: Wii Linux Installer - Early Alpha
app.long_description: An application that downloads and installs Wii Linux for you. You'll need the following: - USB Keyboard - SD Card - BootMii as an IOS or Boot2 installed - SD Card or USB Storage that you don't mind formtatting (lose all data). - An internet connection, using any USB ethernet adapter, or the builtin WiFi (requires setup in the installer).
